Description: 
This application implements a command called "CircleJig" to demonstrate the use of the AcEdJig class, which provides a way to preview the real-time result determinded by the params that you specify during the process of drawing.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "Samples.sln" and switch to the configuration that matches with the ZWCAD versionï¼Œthen build the application.

To use CircleJig.zrx:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing .
2. Run APPLOAD command and load the CircleJig.zrx file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "CircleJig" command. In this command, you can draw a circle by specifying the center and radius.
